channel.title: This is how to fix your geothermal generator, said nobody
channel.description:
I've tried for a while to fix this, I've had Fuscate, snuffly, and others try and help me but to no avail. This thing just wont work, Fuscate even compared his to mine and they were exactly the same, I may of edited it in an incorrect fashion since then but surely I'm doing something wrong that Fuscate isn't. I'd appreciate any help :)
[img]http://puu.sh/2sUAz/063367d700[/img]
The lava source is directly below the pump, and the pump does extend and reach into the lava source. The problem is it isn't transporting it into the generator, or the tank, or into the pipe at all for that matter. I've tried many variations of pipes, heights and what not without success.
Any FTB experts among us? I'm hoping this is a trivial mistake on my part, being somewhat of a FTB newcomer. My only thoughts are that I have the engines in the wrong spot, or the pipe? I watched a youtube video design it like mine, and it works. :confused:

item.title: This is how to fix your geothermal generator, said nobody
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Nevermind, big thanks noodlemanjr for pointing out I was using the wrong type of pump for the job

Read full topic
item.source: This is how to fix your geothermal generator, said nobody
